publicAuth.odyseeHint: Sign in with your Odysee account.
publicAuth.emailVerificationRequired: We sent you a magic link by email. Click it, then come back here to finish signing in.
publicAuth.emailNotFound: That email address isn't registered on Odysee.
publicAuth.loginFailed: Couldn't sign in. Check your email and password, then try again.
publicAuth.needsWalletVerification: To edit settings, connect Wander and sign to verify your wallet.
publicAuth.needsWalletAddress: No wallet detected. Connect Wander or enter your Arweave address to use your saved settings.
publicAuth.magicLinkTooltip: We'll email you a magic link so you can sign in without a password.
publicAuth.magicLinkWaiting: After you click the magic link, come back here to finish signing in.
publicAuth.walletAddressRequired: Please enter your Arweave wallet address to complete sign-in.
publicAuth.backupCodePlaceholder: Enter one of your backup codes
publicAuth.2faSubtitle: Enter the code from your authenticator app.
twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.disablePrompt: Enter your current 2FA code to disable:
twoFactor.description: Protect your account with an extra layer of security.
twoFactor.scanQr: 1. Scan this QR code with your authenticator app:
twoFactor.enterCode: 2. Enter the 6-digit code from your app:
twoFactor.backupCodesDesc: If you lose your device, these are the ONLY way to access your account. Copy them to a safe place.
twoFactor.tutorial.title: 2FA and Security Tutorial
twoFactor.tutorial.step1: Download an authenticator app on your mobile.
twoFactor.tutorial.step2: Start setup in the left panel.
twoFactor.tutorial.step3: Scan the QR code with the app.
twoFactor.tutorial.step4: Enter the verification code to confirm.
twoFactor.tutorial.appsDesc: We recommend using apps that allow cloud backups or token export:
twoFactor.tutorial.backupDesc: It is {important} that you save the recovery codes shown when enabling 2FA. If you lose your device and don't have these codes, you could lose access to your account permanently. Store them in a safe.
securitySettingsDescription: Manage your account security and two-factor authentication.
streamStatsNotConfiguredSuffix: in admin/stream to enable Stream Stats.
lastTipNotConfigured: No tips are configured. Set up your tips with your wallet address.
dashboardControlsDescription: Quick links and tools for your overlays.
announcementLinkHint: If set, a favicon + link will be shown below the message.
title: getty
description: The platform tools for live streaming on Odysee. This includes overlays, tip alerts, chat, giveaway system, creator analytics and much more.
dashboardWidgetSettingsDesc: Configuration options for this widget will appear here.
dashboardRecentEventsSettingsDesc: This widget shows tips, achievements, and giveaway activity in a single feed.
enableTtsAllChatHint: Enable TTS (Text-to-Speech) for all incoming chat messages. This means that all messages that do not have a hyperchat will be heard in the live stream.
ttsHint: Enable or disable text-to-speech for tip notifications
ttsDisabledDueToGlobal: Text-to-speech must be disabled to use global TTS settings
activityEffectEnabledHint: If disabled, the chat widget will not render the flame activity effect. If enabled while the widget is active, you must refresh the widget source for effects to appear.
chatStreakNotification: {user} has reached the chat message streak and is on fire! Congratulations! üéâ
chatUrl: ClaimID of the live stream on Odysee:
copyright: ¬© 2025 getty - AGPL v3 License - Source Code
channelUploadDiscordContentPrefix: The channel has uploaded new content:
confirmClearHistory: Are you sure you want to clear the chat history?
audioHint: The custom audio will be played when a new tip is coming in. If you do not select one, the default audio will be used.
remoteAudioDescription: Use remote audio for tip notifications
customAudioDescription: Use custom audio for tip notifications
uploadAudioInstructions: Upload an audio file to use as a custom audio for tip notifications
uploadAudioRequirements: Audio file must be less than 1MB and in MP3 format
raffleWidgetObsHelp: Use this URL in OBS to add the giveaway widget to your stream.
raffleAdminSectionDesc: Manage your giveaways, choose winners, and view participants.
raffleNoActive: There is no active giveaway. Create or set up a giveaway with your community in a live stream.
raffleCommandHint: You can use the command with or without ! (e.g., giveaway or !giveaway).
invalidArweaveWalletLastTip: The wallet address (Last Tip) is not valid for the Arweave network.
invalidArweaveWalletTipGoal: The wallet address (Tip Goal) is not valid for the Arweave network.
obsIntegrationHelpIntro: Use these widget URLs in OBS as Browser sources. Adjust width/height as suggested.
obsWidgetsJsonHelp: Open /obs/widgets for a JSON of all URLs and recommended sizes.
obsTipShutdownSource: Enable “Shutdown source when not visible” in OBS if you see stale data.
obsTipScaleCss: Set custom CSS scaling with transform: scale(0.9) if needed.
obsTipFirewall: Ensure your firewall allows local connections to this server (default http://localhost:3000).
avatarRandomBg: Random default avatar background per message
avatarRandomBgHint: If enabled, users without avatar will get a random background color on each message.
obsWsReminderDesc: When configuring OBS WebSocket with a remote IP, the widget URLs will change so OBS can access them from that address. You must use the remote IP, not the one sent by OBS.
obsWsReminderNetwork: Make sure the IP and port are accessible from your network.
obsWsReminderRemoteUrl: OBS must use the new widget URL (remote IP), not localhost.
obsWsReminderLocalMode: If you don't use OBS WebSocket, widgets will work in localhost mode.
obsWsReminderUpdateUrl: If you change the IP, update the widget URLs in OBS.
obsWsReminderFirewall: Make sure your firewall allows connections to the OBS port.
obsWsReminderNetworkConfig: If you have issues, check your network and firewall configuration.
obsWsReminderCopyUrl: You can copy the updated URL from each integration panel in getty.
raffleWarningChat: For the participant counter to work properly, make sure you have chat enabled from the getty settings.
chatThemeDeleteOnlyCustom: Only custom themes can be deleted.
lastTipCustomTitleHint: Title shown in widget. Leave empty for default.
tipGoalCustomTitleHint: Title shown in widget. Leave empty for default.
goalFollowersPendingHint: Connect Odysee and select your channel
notificationGifHint: Any GIF size is displayed scaled to the maximum or within the design.
notificationGifUnifiedHint: The GIF saves together with the notification settings; no separate save button.
audioLibrarySubtitle: Reuse uploaded notification audio clips to avoid duplicates.
audioLibraryEmptyHint: Upload or save a custom audio clip to build your library.
audioLibraryDeleteDesc: This removes the file from Supabase storage and cannot be undone.
audioLibraryDeleteNotAllowed: Clips stored on Arweave cannot be deleted.
imageLibrarySubtitle: Reuse uploaded images across modules and avoid duplicate uploads.
imageLibraryEmptyHint: Upload or reuse an image to build your library.
imageLibraryDeleteConfirmBody: Delete "{fileName}" from your library? The Supabase copy will also be removed.
imageLibraryDeleteToastUnsupported: This image is stored externally and must be removed where it was uploaded.
invalidAudioFile: Invalid audio file. Please select a valid audio file.
toggleUsernameOverride: Override username colors (otherwise the palette is used)
usernameOverrideOn: These colors will replace the per-user palette.
usernameOverrideOff: Using the cyberpunk palette, each user gets a different color.
transparentBgHint: If enabled, chat panel background becomes fully transparent.
walletHiddenHostedNotice: Hidden for security in hosted mode. Connect your wallet on this browser to view it.
walletHiddenLocalNotice: Hidden for security when accessing localhost from another device. Open the admin on the same machine (http://localhost:3000) to view it.
walletSessionPrefillNotice: Prefilled from your Wander session. Save to keep this address.
walletSessionPrefillCombinedHint: Leave empty to clear your wallet address. Prefilled from your Wander session. Save to keep this address.
welcomeTokenExpired: Session expired. Please log in again to refresh your dashboard link.
welcomeCaptionAllForOdysee: Everything for your livestreams on Odysee
testMessagesHint: Send a fake chat message or a donation to preview styles without using real chat.
livePresetNewStream: New stream is up ‚Äî come hang out!
liveAutoSendOnLive: Send automatically when channel goes live (requires saved channel URL)
liveTargetsNone: No live targets configured. Configure Discord/Telegram or set a Discord override.
liveAutoPrereqClaimId: For automatic notifications to work, you must configure the ClaimID in Viewers or Stream History to detect when you are live.
liveCredsWebhookHelp: This is your global Discord live webhook, it will be used for all live stream notifications (manual, automatic and test) unless you set a substitution in the live notifications panel. Telegram does not support sending substitution here; so set it globally in this section.
liveClaimIdHelp: Optional: ensures the Channel URL matches the exact live post.
liveClaimIdMismatch: ‚úó ClaimID does not match the URL
liveClaimIdNoUrlHint: Enter the Channel URL to verify this ClaimID
liveDiscordOverrideHint: Optional: send this post to a specific Discord channel.
tokenTipsBody: Use the admin token only inside the admin panel. Share the public token with OBS widgets if you want others to see overlays without control access. In hosted mode, tokens isolate your data and real time updates.
chatThemeOverwriteHint: A theme with this name exists. Saving will overwrite it.
chatThemeNewHint: This will create a new theme.
chatThemeSizeBlockRebuilt: Font size block rebuilt to match sliders
chatThemeCustomHint: Custom themes (‚òÖ) are the ones you create or edit.
exportModalHint: Copy this JSON to back up or share your custom themes.
importModalHint: Paste themes JSON. Choose how to handle name conflicts.
blockedAccessMessage: The configuration for {moduleName} has been temporarily disabled by a moderator.
comingSoonAlertBody: This panel will host a new feature that‚Äôs in active development. Check back soon!
achievementsBannerDesc: Receive achievement notifications. Configure achievements for viewers, chat, and tips. Display notifications in OBS and on the home page.
achievementsSoundRowDesc: Toggle sound, set volume and choose the audio source for achievements
achievementsSoundLabel: Use a custom sound for your tip notification. You can use the default sound or upload your own mp3 file and adjust the volume.
achievementsChannelAuthWarning: Channel achievements require an auth token configured in Admin ‚Üí Channel first.
achievementsTimeTooltip: Weekly and monthly time achievements auto‚Äëreset at the start of each new week/month. Lifetime ones never reset.

toastDuplicateUploadUsingExisting: Using existing file from your gallery.
streamHistoryDataPointsHint: Number of stored samples feeding the chart and KPIs. Bigger collections may load a bit slower, but no action is required.
streamHistoryDailyGoalHint: Bars above this goal highlight in red
streamHistorySamplingCaption: Samples roughly every ~{cadence}; last point {ago} ago
streamHistoryRangeErrorOrder: Start date must be before end date
streamHistoryViewersTrendEmpty: No viewer data available in this range
externalSecretLegend: Click on the eye to reveal them. Delete and save to remove them.
wanderAuth.title: Wander Wallet Login
wanderAuth.description: Connect your Arweave wallet via Wander to activate an isolated configuration space.
wanderAuth.sessionStale: The server session expired or was restarted. Reauthenticate to continue.
wanderAuth.stepOneHint: 1. Request the nonce and sign the message.
wanderAuth.errorNoAddressFromExtension: Extension did not return an address
wanderAuth.infoNonceDummy: Nonce received. Dummy mode will sign automatically with TEST.
wanderAuth.infoNonce: Nonce received. Proceed to sign with your wallet (ArConnect/Wander).
wanderAuth.errorAddressMismatch: Signing address differs from the requested address
walletPublic.bannerMissing: Not detected. Install the extension to sign in securely.
walletPublic.publicKeyMissing: Public key could not be obtained
walletPublic.openInstallConfirm: Open the Wander Wallet installation page?
walletPublic.alertSuffix: Make sure you have the Wander Wallet extension installed and enabled.
tenantConfigDescription: Export or import your user configuration settings. This includes all module configurations for your wallet session.
landingHeroTitle: All your streaming and analytics tools for your Odysee channel here.
landingHeroSubtitle: If you are a creator or streamer on Odysee, with getty you can configure widgets, create alerts, and view your channel analytics in real time with a single login; getty takes care of everything so you can focus on creating.
landingPreviewLastTipSub: Automatically update every tip you receive with the power of Arweave.
landingPreviewGoalThanks: Thank you all for your tips on my Odysee live streams. You're the best!
landingPreviewChatSub: Receive community chat messages to OBS overlays, set up custom themes or create your own chat themes.
landingFeaturesTitle: All you need for a spectacular live stream
landingFeaturesCopy: Dashboards, overlays, and tips on your live stream. Configure once and go live in confidence.
landingFeatureLastTipCopy: Celebrate your latest hyperchats or tips with your audience by creating raffles or giveaways.
landingFeatureGoalsCopy: Set tip goals, reset goals and show progress in OBS whenever you want.
landingFeatureTTSCopy: Receive text-to-speech messages when you receive hyperchats, or set text-to-speech for everyone.
landingFeatureChatCopy: Synchronize Odysee chat with overlays in OBS or any live streaming software. Receive emojis, stickers and hyperchats.
landingFeatureAnalyticsCopy: Record your live streaming history, average views and accumulated hours automatically. Export your history whenever you need it.
landingFeatureAutomationCopy: Notify everyone on Discord or Telegram that your live stream has started, customize your post or send out tip notifications.
landingWidgetsTitle: Integrations for OBS, Streamlabs, Meld Studio or your favorite streaming software.
landingWidgetsCopy: Each widget ships with a secure token URL. Paste it once in OBS and we keep it in sync with your settings, even across multiple devices.
landingWidgetsStepOne: Log in to getty using your Wander wallet.
landingWidgetsStepTwo: Copy the secure widget link from the admin panel.
landingWidgetsStepThree: Add your widget in OBS and updates happen automatically.
landingWidgetRealtime: In real time on your live stream
landingAutomationTitle: Let automations take care of your streaming achievements and receive notifications.
landingAutomationCopy: Post on social networks when you start live streaming, unlock achievements from your live streams. All automations respect your wallet session and your security preferences.
landingAutomationItemOne: Social media posts for Discord and Telegram.
landingAutomationItemTwo: Goal-based audio celebrations with custom MP3s.
landingAutomationItemThree: Stream history and analytics on each live stream.
landingAutomationStepOne: Hyperactive chat: 400 messages in one stream
landingAutomationStepThree: Community generosity: Total of $100 in tips
landingPreviewLastTipExample: Wow! Excellent live stream. Receive a tip: $4.5 (AR)
landingPreviewChatQuote: "It is an excellent live, and the widgets connect instantly."
landingWidgetTipNotificationCopy: Animated alerts with GIF images, colors, text-to-speech, and remote or custom sounds.
landingWidgetTipGoalCopy: Tip targets with celebratory animations when completed.
landingGiveawaysCopy: Set up raffles with custom commands for your Odysee chat, raffle prizes, or give away anything you want.
eventsActivityDescription: Choose which live stream activities to display in the events widget.
eventsPreviewDescription: See how your events will look in OBS.
eventsThemeDescription: Customize colors and appearance of the events display.
eventsAnimationDescription: Set animation style and get the OBS widget URL.
eventsObsUrlHint: Use this URL in OBS as a Browser source to display live events.
publicProfileLoadUnknown: Something went wrong while loading this profile.
publicProfileMissing: This public profile does not exist.
publicProfileNotAvailable: This public profile is not available.
